title: AI Prompts for Business Strategy and Planning
tldr: Generate SWOT analyses, growth strategies, financial projections, and market research insights faster with structured AI prompts.

questions.q: Can AI help with strategic decisions?
questions.a: AI provides data analysis and scenario planning to inform decisions, but strategic judgment remains human.

questions.q: How accurate are AI market insights?
questions.a: AI can identify patterns and trends, but validate insights with current market data and expert analysis.
